title: Why stable releases were discontinued?
author: darksidds
body_snippet:
The latest stable release on https://mremoteng.org/download is dated Apr 19, 2019, but there are lots of commits on github and nightly builds. 
Why there were no stable releases since then? 
Should one use nighly builds? Is there any official statement on this topic?

comments.snippet: its not, but we have some significant changes after such release and still working on stabilisation so nb its just to check early for entusiasts but its have still several weak places where I am working at the moment before next nb, what will be candidate to preview and if no much issues and bugs will be anonced as new stable (hope this year)
comments.author: Kvarkas

comments.snippet: Thanks a lot! I'll join the testing.
comments.author: darksidds

comments.snippet: Not very useful that new version `v1.77.3.1784-NB` doesn't try to automatically import confCons.xml from `C:\Users\username\AppData\Roaming\mRemoteNG` folder.
comments.author: darksidds

comments.snippet: I currently run with 1.77.2-nb to have the config saving and so on enabled...

comments.snippet:
